markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs=""
>
[Gingerbread House](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1708)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Structure" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=153" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 240 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L when not activated
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A gingerbread house is made of magical gingerbread sweetened with honey and spices, and further decorated with candies and icing. Its roof tiles are made of sugar. It can be held safely in one hand but is very delicate; it's often stored within a wooden box of 1 Bulk.

<document level="2" id="action-1275" />

**Craft Requirements** You can attempt [Cooking Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) checks instead of [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) checks to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) a gingerbread house.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gingerbread House
